column7: The Nodes file describes the characteristics of each individual country on the map
The Node file will be much shorter than the Edges file. Just the total Donor Countries + the total Recipient Countries
We may use the Country Codes to connect this data to the OOSC data, so if its possible to build using UIS country codes
Either way, the Country Codes in the Nodes file, must be the same as those used in the Edges file
If the OECD Country Codes are different than the UIS Country Codes we can use the additional column to document that information.
The country names will be used to populate labels, so if you have preferred spelling or structure, document that here
If long/lat are not readily available and you do not have a preferred geojson for us to work with, we will retrieve this information.
Differentiate between Donor and Recipient Countries. This column will be used to color the countries so Donor and Recipients are visibly different.

Name of Country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
The former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia
